web_snippets: Cristian is a social entrepreneur, campaigner and systems change expert in the healthcare, social justice and sustainability sectors.
Cristian is a Professor in the CS Department at NJIT, where he has been since receiving his Ph.D. from Rutgers University in 2004.
Cristian Mungiu is a Romanian filmmaker. He won the Palme d'Or at the 2007 Cannes Film Festival for his film 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days, which he wrote ...
